name: sb8euv

body: |- wb(weu(s0, w0), weu(s1, wsb(s1, s0, w0)))

comment: Variable substitution in unique existential quantifier. Version of ~ sb8eu requiring more disjoint variables, but fewer axioms. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 7-Feb-2023.)
